techmeme.title: Meta confirms users can now cross-post from Instagram and Facebook to Threads globally, after rolling out Instagram and Facebook cross-posting in 2021 (Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch)
Ticketing service TickPick raised $250M from Brighton Park, which now has a majority stake, and Symphony; the app has 2M MAUs and processes nearly $1B annually (Gillian Tan/Bloomberg)
Mike Lynch experienced some of the most extreme career highs and lows of any British tech entrepreneur, selling Autonomy for $11B before a 12-year legal ordeal (Financial Times)
The NHTSA closes a preliminary probe into Cruise's hard-braking and immobilization issues in 1,194 autonomous ride-hailing vehicles, after Cruise made updates (Akash Sriram/Reuters)
Chinese self-driving startup WeRide delays its planned IPO in the US, citing its need for more time to complete documents, after filing for an IPO in July 2024 (CNBC)
